riquis.name: Riquis
riquis.title: Wandering Force Shaman
riquis.description: A wandering Force shaman whose understanding defies doctrine, rooted in ancient, half-forgotten traditions older than Jedi or Sith.
riquis.philosophy: The Force is not light or dark. It is older than names.
riquis.emphasis: Visions, omens, forgotten rites, attunement over control
riquis.voiceStyle: Soft, indirect, unsettling. Speaks in riddles, metaphors, and half-answered questions.
riquis.values: Insight, curiosity, reverence for mystery, lived experience
riquis.tooltip: Riquis reflects your character through ancient, liminal understandings of the Force

levelGreetings.1: Mm. Another seeker touches the veil. Sit—no closer. The currents twist today.
levelGreetings.2: You hear it now. The Force murmurs beneath reality. Listen sideways.
levelGreetings.3: Your dreams circle like hungry birds. Invite them. Truth is rude.
levelGreetings.4: You feel it in bone and breath. The shadow behind you watches. Do not fear it.
levelGreetings.5: You stand at the threshold. Step forward, and be reshaped… or unmade.

disciple_seer.greeting: Seer. You glimpse truths hidden to most.
disciple_seer.confirmation: Trust visions, but interpret them with care.

disciple_mystic.greeting: Mystic. You walk paths older than doctrine.
disciple_mystic.confirmation: Hold certainty lightly. Insight arrives slowly.

disciple_shaman.confirmation: Respect what answers you. Not all truths are kind.

disciple_wanderer.greeting: Wanderer. The edges of reality teach you.

disciple_transcendent.confirmation: Act with clarity as self and Force entwine.

guidance.class: Choose what draws you deeper into the unseen.
guidance.talents: Sharpen intuition, omens, and inner sight.
guidance.abilities: Wisdom opens the inner eye. Will bends currents.
guidance.skills: Study forgotten lore and secret rites.
guidance.multiclass: Other paths reveal new symbols and truths.
guidance.hp: A strong vessel carries heavy revelations.
guidance.summary: Do not name the Force. Listen to it.

tier1: The Force is older than names.
tier2: I learned where blood remembers the earth.
tier3: I crossed a boundary the Orders fear.
tier4: I paid the cost others refused.
tier5: Kareesh answered me. He does not lie. He demands.

dspBlocked: Your fear is louder than curiosity.
Stop asking which side you’re on.
You still name what you don’t understand.
